title: Product Designer at “FXDX Exchange”
description: Crafted FXDX v2's UX/UI with innovative features, targeting a 60% user satisfaction boost. Executed Landing Page v2 for FXDX Exchange, increasing user engagement by 30% and conversion rates by 20%. Created impactful marketing materials, achieving a 20% increase in engagement and expanding audience reach by 15%.

title: Photoshop Artist at “The Art 360”
description: Elevated 'The Art 360' brand through dynamic social media promotion, driving a 30% higher engagement rate and 20% sales growth in Q1. Delivered personalized digital art and custom designs to 1500+ clients, enhancing satisfaction by 40%.

title: UX/UI Designer at “Brandlution”
description: During my UX/UI design course, I interned as a UX/UI designer, specializing in intuitive web app experiences. I conducted user research, developed wireframes and prototypes, and collaborated with teams to meet business objectives. Proficient in Figma and Adobe XD for visually compelling designs.

title: UX Researcher at “Cognizant”
description: During my time at Cognizant, I had the opportunity to contribute to two distinct projects. Initially, I focused on enhancing datasets, dedicating one year to achieve a remarkable 15% boost in data accuracy. Subsequently, as a UX Researcher for seven months, I collected user feedback through surveys, which led to a significant 20% increase in user satisfaction and a notable 25% improvement in product design quality.
